name: Eat this!
description:
Have you ever tried to feed hungry flowers at the botanic garden? Well, now you have a chance! But careful, it's not so easy!

In this VR game, you are trying to feed hungry flowers with juicy fruits and you have to make it before the time is up. Every level is harder and harder and the flowers want to eat more and more. So, grab a fruit from the machine and feed flowers by throwing the fruit into their mouths. If you miss, flowers get hungry and they will send bugs to your machine! Luckily, you have a bonus level with the first aids to repair your machine.

Good luck!
